message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this great product to you first. I think it would be perfect for your needs. My starting price is $145. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $110. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $110 is a bit low for me, I'm willing to come down to $130 to make this a good deal for both of us. What do you say?
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above $130. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $115. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
